message:
Running command: cat > /workspace/diff.txt << 'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py
@@
-    from sympy.core.numbers import igcdex
-    a, n, p = as_int(a), as_int(n), as_int(p)
-    if n == 2:
-        return sqrt_mod(a, p, all_roots)
+    from sympy.core.numbers import igcdex
+    a, n, p = as_int(a), as_int(n), as_int(p)
+    # if a is divisible by p then x = 0 is a solution modulo prime p
+    if a % p == 0:
+        if all_roots:
+            return [0]
+        else:
+            return 0
+    if n == 2:
+        return sqrt_mod(a, p, all_roots)
*** End Patch
PATCH

*** Begin Patch

+    # if a is divisible by p then x = 0 is a solution modulo prime p
+    if a % p == 0:
+        if all_roots:

+        else:
+            return 0
+    if n == 2:
